snippet.title: Trace Hunters | Steam Release Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Official gameplay trailer for Trace Hunters, coming to Steam July 23, 2024!

Trace Hunters is a third-person shooter where you pilot a futuristic combat vehicle. Outnumbered and alone, blast through hordes of enemies to discover precious resources and traces of lost technology. 

Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2706210?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=releasegameplaytrailer
